title: Bob Saget Remembered: Comedians, ‘Full House’ Co-Stars, Fans React to His Death
sub_head: ‘I am broken. I am gutted,’ colleague John Stamos says after actor was found dead in an Orlando hotel room
body:
Comedians and actors alike paid tribute to Bob Saget, the comedian and actor who was found dead over the weekend in Orlando while on tour.
Mr. Saget is often associated with his acting tenure as Danny Tanner, a widower and father to three girls on the TV comedy “Full House.” He was also the longtime host of “America’s Funniest Home Videos.”
